title: the extent as marked in red on the maps attached to this Order together with, in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Designation of National
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Designation of National 

Managed Roads) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road act 1993 (designation national managed roads) order 2024

title: the extent as marked in red on the maps attached to this Order together with, in
heading: 2. The national roads being the N50 and those parts of the N1 and N11,
text_raw:
2. The national roads being the N50 and those parts of the N1 and N11, 
classified as such under the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of National Roads) 
Order 2012 (S.I. No. 53 of 2012), are designated as national managed roads to 
the extent as marked in red on the maps attached to this Order together with, in 
the case of each junction, such other parts of the road shown on the relevant map 
for the junction. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th December, 2024.

title: the extent as marked in red on the maps attached to this Order together with, in
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order designates the M50 Motorway, part of the M1 Motorway and part of 
the M11 Motorway as National Managed Roads in accordance with Section 10A 
of the Roads Act, 1993. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [688] 25
